name: Hobo Run 3D
description:
Run as fast as you can, Police are coming!

Hobo Run is an endless runner game with awesome 3d graphics, realistic physics, and lots of fun.
Be careful with the obstacles and car traffic, everything is random !
Collect coins to purchase new runner Characters, Upgrades and Powerups!

• You can get 4 different Powerups:
*Double Coin
*Coin Magnet
*Invincibility
*Speed Boost
with 3 upgrade level.

• Online Highscores to challenge your friends and people all over the world,
getting to first Hobo Runner on the leaderboard !

Score multiplier can be increased permanently by completing Missions:

Novice Runner run for 500 points
Competent Runner run for 1500 points
Expert Runner run for 5000 points

- Novice CoinCollector collect 50 coins
- Competent CoinCollector collect 150 coins
- Expert CoinCollector collect 500 coins

- Novice PlayCount play 5 games
- Competent PlayCount play 15 games
- Expert PlayCount play 50 games


Controls:

Just slide left, right, up, down
